author: 世界新聞網
title: 健康蔬食免蛋白質吃不夠 北榮營養師搭配8種食材顧健康
text:
健康蔬食免蛋白質吃不夠 北榮營養師搭配8種食材顧健康
近年來，健康蔬食風潮席捲全球，不僅節能減碳，還能有助健康。台北榮總致力推動節能減碳措施，如今從院內員工餐及病人飲食做起，每周提供蔬食餐點，更設計出營養健康均衡的蔬食三套餐，每套餐均含蛋白質70公克以上，精選有毛豆、豆包、雞蛋、優格、起司等，膳食纖維至少25公克，讓人享受美食，也兼顧健康。
健康蔬食蔚為風尚，美國2012年起威斯康辛州的水城區域醫療中心，推動健康飲食在地化，於院區種植各種蔬果提供病人食用，實踐從農場到醫院病床的供餐革新作法；英國2019年起有53間醫院提供素食三明治；馬來西亞2021年起醫院響應健康蔬食風，制定星期一無肉日；紐約市2022年有11家公立醫院將蔬食設為預設餐點選項。
台北榮總副院長林永煬說，該院致力於節能減碳，一年減少碳排量共1738.1萬度電，總減碳量相當於22.2座大安森林公園一年吸碳量，如今更進一步從健康蔬食開始。
北榮營養部主任曾芬玲說，2024年起員工餐廳實施6天無肉日，2025年起每周一供應蔬食無肉早餐、每周一次蔬食快餐、每天一道蔬食麵食、住院病人也有多種蔬食餐點可供選擇。此外，並邀請專家學者，舉辦多場介紹蔬食鎮課程及員工手作活動，如蘿蔔糕產品製作及教學等。
曾芬玲指出，多肉飲食者改用食用純素，每日可減少7.77公斤碳排；改食用蔬食，每日可減少6.08公斤，若換算成每餐，純素可減少2.59公斤、蔬食可減少2.02公斤。北榮過往平均一年提供5.3萬份蔬食餐點，預計今年提高至7萬餐，而從肉食變成蔬食，以每公斤減少2公斤碳排量估算，總共可以減少14公斤的碳排量。
北榮營養部營養師舒宜芳說，植物性食物大多是低碳排，比動物性食物低10至50倍，魚類、家禽及豬肉次之，牛肉是碳排放第一名的肉類，且適量攝取蔬果有助降低罹患慢性病風險。
依「EAT-Lancet」委員會指出，植物為主的飲食型態每年可預防約1100萬名成人死亡，1080萬人的疾病風險，其研究證實，蔬食飲食可以降低心血管疾病、癌症、肥胖、血脂肪及全因死亡風險，而增加纖維攝取，也可以改善腸胃道疾病如便祕、預防憇室症及腸道癌症等。
經北榮營養部設計三套健康蔬食，其內容選擇高纖主食，如紅藜麥飯、紫米飯、芝麻饅頭、全麥土司及雜糧餐包；豐富的蛋白質來源，除了毛豆、豆包、豆腐、豆漿之外，還有雞蛋、牛奶、優格、起司等，免除國人擔心蔬食的蛋白質不足疑慮。
除此之外，並有豐富蔬果，如綠花菜、龍鬚菜、高麗菜、胡蘿蔔、番茄、蘆筍、黃豆芽、紫甘藍、櫛瓜、茄子、秋葵與各色甜椒，再佐以當令在地水果，以芹菜、九層塔、洋蔥等提味，不但顏色豐富、風味佳，也促進食慾。
三套健康蔬食
中式蔬食套餐：
早餐：雜糧芝麻饅頭配無糖堅果豆漿及水果
午餐：中式蔬食套餐，內容有高麗菜捲、塔香茄子、香菇水蓮、松柏長青，配紅藜飯及山藥胡蘿蔔湯，再搭配水果
晚餐：番茄雞蛋麵配燙青菜
異國蔬食套餐(I)：
早餐：五彩三明治配低脂奶
午餐：壽司／飯糰／玉子燒配味噌蔬菜豆腐湯
晚餐：韓式拌飯，內容有荷包蛋、韓式炒豆干、黑椒毛豆、涼拌小黃瓜、黃豆芽，配海帶芽湯及水果
異國蔬食套餐(II)：
早餐：田園青醬披薩配無糖優格
午餐：西式蔬食套餐配水果（西班牙烘蛋、炸豆腐佐匈牙利醬、芥末西芹、義式烤時蔬、全麥餐包及南瓜濃湯）
晚餐：白醬義大利蝴蝶麵配水果

author: sina.com.cn
title: 《艾尔登法环》计划登陆下一代任天堂主机引发热议|艾尔登法环|任天堂_新浪科技_新浪网
text: 艾尔登法环计划于2025年在下一代任天堂主机上推出。此消息一经公布，便引起了广大玩家的热议与期待。作为一款备受瞩目的游戏作品，艾尔登法环以其独特的世界观、深刻的剧情设计以及极具挑战性的游戏玩法，吸引了众多玩家的关注。
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Landis Canada Records First Goal as Missouri Falls to Miami 2-1
text:
Landis Canada Records First Goal as Missouri Falls to Miami 2-1
In their latest match,
University of Missouri soccer suffered a 2-1 defeat to Miami, despite a standout performance from freshman Landis Canada, who scored her first career goal. The Tigers were down 2-0 when Canada managed to convert a header from a corner kick in the 69th minute, cutting the deficit but unable to find the equalizer before the final whistle. Miami secured their win with goals scored in the 39th and 49th minutes. Although Missouri dominated shots on goal, they struggled to capitalize on their offensive opportunities.
- Missouri outshot Miami 12 to 6.
- The Tigers had 5 shots on goal compared to Miami's 4.
- Missouri's current season record stands at 1-3-1.
- The team will have a bye week before facing SEMO on Sept. 8.
Following their bye week, Missouri will seek to recover with a matchup against SEMO, aiming to improve their season record and build on recent performances.Bottom Line
Despite a solid individual showing from Canada, the Tigers need to convert on scoring opportunities if they hope to turn their season around against SEMO.
Read more at
 University of Missouri Athletics

author: Christyan Estrada
title: Forman lluvias cascada en San Martín de las Vacas en Ramos Arizpe
text:
Coahuila
Forman lluvias cascada en San Martín de las Vacas en Ramos Arizpe
El fenómeno, considerado uno de los más espectaculares en la región tras las lluvias, se registra en un sitio que además es aprovechado por los visitantes
- 10
-
Julio
2025
Las recientes lluvias registradas en la zona rural de Ramos Arizpe formaron una cascada en el cañón del ejido San Martín de las Vacas, en el sitio conocido como El Salto, donde el agua fluye entre rocas y barrancos para después descender hacia el valle de General Cepeda.
El fenómeno, considerado uno de los más espectaculares en la región tras las lluvias, se registra en un sitio que además es aprovechado por los visitantes para practicar senderismo, rapel y otras actividades al aire libre.
El lugar también ofrece vestigios históricos como petrograbados, visibles en distintos puntos del camino.
La cascada nace en el punto más alto del ejido y sus corrientes se extienden hasta Rincón Colorado y la presa La Rosa, lo que permite observar una amplia panorámica del valle desde la cima del cañón.
Autoridades municipales señalaron que este tipo de fenómenos fortalecen el potencial ecoturístico de la zona rural de Ramos Arizpe.
El acceso a la cascada está controlado por los ejidatarios, quienes permiten el ingreso a visitantes de forma responsable.
Desde el gobierno local se ha hecho un llamado a respetar el entorno natural, evitar dejar residuos y conservar la biodiversidad del sitio.
Comentarios

author: Aulia Faradiva
title: Join the 2025 Undergraduate Program (UM Pathway) at FIB Undip: It's Time to Study at a Faculty of Quality and Integrity!
text:
Are you looking for a university that not only excels academically but also offers a warm, inclusive learning environment grounded in integrity? Don’t miss this golden opportunity to join the Faculty of Humanities, Universitas Diponegoro (FIB Undip) through the 2025 Undergraduate Program – Independent Selection Pathway (Jalur UM)!
With a strong reputation and years of experience as one of the leading faculties, FIB Undip is ready to guide you toward a bright and meaningful future.
A Selection of Relevant and Forward-Thinking Study Programs Through the 2025 UM Pathway, FIB Undip is opening registration for six popular undergraduate programs, each designed to equip you with practical knowledge that meets the demands of today’s world:
1. Bachelor’s in Indonesian Literature Perfect for those who love language and literature and are passionate about preserving Indonesian culture through writing and literary studies.
2. Bachelor’s in History Ideal for students who enjoy exploring the past to better understand the present and shape the future. History never goes out of style!
3. Bachelor’s in English Literature Unlock global opportunities by mastering an international language. Great for aspiring translators or professionals aiming for international careers.
4. Bachelor’s in Japanese Language and Culture Fascinated by Japanese culture? This program will immerse you in the Japanese language and provide deep cultural insights.
5. Bachelor’s in Library and Information Science In the digital era, information is everything. This program is perfect for those interested in data management, documentation, and information technology.
6. Bachelor’s in Social Anthropology Curious about human behavior and society? This program explores culture, tradition, and social dynamics up close.
2025 UM Pathway Registration Timeline Mark these important dates!
Online Registration: April 9 – June 12, 2025
Online Exam: June 16 – 26, 2025
Selection Results Announcement: July 8, 2025
All stages are conducted online via the following PMB Undip link:
[ https://pmb.undip.ac.id/sarjana/jalur-um-sarjana/ ]
Why Choose FIB Undip? A campus rooted in cultural and humanistic values Experienced and inspiring lecturers Opportunities for research, student exchange, and international projects Alumni thrive in diverse professional fields, from journalism to cultural diplomacy Make Your Dreams Come True with FIB Undip! Don’t wait for the opportunity to knock twice. Apply now and become part of the FIB Undip family a community of critical thinkers, creative minds, and empathetic learners.
FIB Undip – Excellence with Integrity!
